title: Wanted: Ghostbusting Bride
description: Two warring ghosts drive Spencer Markham to seek a ghostbusting wife. He has one week to convince Kailyn Baker to marry him, but she has a bad attitude, wants nothing to do with marriage, and refuses to believe ghosts exist. Can he convince her to join him in defeating the specters before the ghostsâ€™ violence turns deadly?
author: Margaret Breashears
